isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Power Source (Sleeper) W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper

svcproc.title: Power Source (Sleeper) W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper
svcproc.para: If an accessory is plugged into the Console Power Source socket, power will flow from battery stud B2 through circuit 14AP, fuse F8 - D, circuit 14AX, 14P, fuse K4, and circuit 84A to Console Power Source socket. The ground path is circuit 11B to sleeper ground.
